text: And when Allah says, ´´Isa son of Maryam! Did you say to people, "Take me and my mother as gods besides Allah?"´ he will say, ´Glory be to You! It is not for me to say what I have no right to say! If I had said it, then You would have known it. You know what is in my self but I do not know what is in Your Self. You are the Knower of all unseen things
